format: C++ header file with Google Mock
description: This file defines a mock class 'DRMScreenCaptureApiImplMock' for unit testing, which mocks the 'DRMScreenCaptureApiImpl' interface including methods such as Init, GetScreenInfo, ScreenCapture, and Destroy.

classes.name: DRMScreenCaptureApiImplMock
classes.description: A mock class inheriting from DRMScreenCaptureApiImpl, providing mock implementations for testing purposes.

methods.name: Init
methods.description: Mocks the initialization of the screen capture API.

methods.name: ScreenCapture
methods.description: Mocks capturing the screen into an output buffer.

methods.name: Destroy
methods.description: Mocks destroying the screen capture handle.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(bool, ScreenCapture, (DRMScreenCapture* handle, uint8_t* output, uint32_t size), (override))
